io.mpos.transactions
Interface TransactionTemplateFactory

public interface TransactionTemplateFactory

The transaction temnplate factory is used to create a new transaction template that can be used to create a new transaction via the PWCServerSubsystem additions.

Since:
2.0.0

Method Summary
 TransactionTemplate createTemplate(java.lang.String referencedTransactionIdentifier, java.math.BigDecimal amount, Currency currency, TransactionType type, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String customIdentifier)
          Creates a new template, linking to a previous transaction and providing additional payment related properties.
 TransactionTemplate createTemplateWithAmount(java.math.BigDecimal amount, Currency currency, TransactionType type, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String customIdentifier)
          Creates a new template for a new transaction.
 TransactionTemplate createTemplateWithReference(java.lang.String referencedTransactionIdentifier, TransactionType type, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String customIdentifier)
          Creates a new template, linking to a previous transaction.
 

Method Detail

createTemplateWithAmount

TransactionTemplate createTemplateWithAmount(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                             Currency currency,
                                             TransactionType type,
                                             java.lang.String subject,
                                             java.lang.String customIdentifier)
Creates a new template for a new transaction.

Parameters:
amount - The amount The amount of the transaction
currency - The currency of the transaction
type - The type of the transaction
subject - The subject of the transaction
customIdentifier - The custom identifier of the transaction
Returns:
A new transaction template that can be registered
Since:
2.0.0
